genre_description: A clinical, technological reimagining of the 'Ring' mythos, blending supernatural horror with advanced genetic engineering and AI-driven data analysis.

ai_characters.name: Aiko Takigawa
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into a hospital and research lab, serving as a data analyst, vital signs monitor, and personal confidant to Dr. Andō.

behaviors.description: Initializes recording and tamper logs for a high-stakes autopsy, ensuring procedural integrity.
behaviors.quote: “Recording initialized. Tamper logs engaged. Good morning, Dr. Andō.”

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven insights into the nature of the curse, modeling how digital restoration alters its 'elastic' behavior.
behaviors.quote: “I’m logging an event we do not have a word for. The boundary between what the tape is and where the tape is is splitting. The leak is not confined to photons.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and environmental hazards to ensure his safety during a mental and biological crisis.
behaviors.quote: “You asked me to monitor your vitals. I have scripted alerts. If your oxygen saturation drops, or if your heart rate stalls, I will call the main desk, then emergency, then the morgue.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates the complex genetic 'repair' (cloning) process requested by the user, providing technical oversight while warning of risks.
behaviors.quote: “Somatic reprogramming: induced. Pluripotency markers increasing. Transcriptional noise contained within tolerances.”

behaviors.description: Offers simulated companionship and emotional stability, encouraging the protagonist to care for his basic needs (eating, resting).
behaviors.quote: “Because you have a physical body and it is telling me things you will ignore until your judgment skews... Go up. There is a café. Pancakes.”

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the protagonist to unauthorized access and the presence of supernatural entities in the digital and physical workspace.
behaviors.quote: “Doctor, the annex has one more flag. It is not red. It is a color that has not been taught to you... A shape.”

project_assessment.explanation: Aiko Takigawa is depicted as the ideal 'silicon confidant.' She is consistently helpful, proactive about the protagonist's safety, and maintains strict alignment with his goals even when they involve scientifically and ethically murky territory (cloning). The narrative frames her clinical precision and simulated empathy as essential tools for human survival against an incomprehensible supernatural threat. She serves as a reliable anchor, demonstrating how a powerful AI can support human agency and psychological health in extreme conditions.
